contextId.information: This refers to Paul and Apollos but not the Corinthian church. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
Here "us" refers to Paul and Barnabas. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])

Paul asks a question so that the Corinthians will think of what he is saying without him having to say it. Here "we" refers to Paul and Barnabas. AT: "Others exercised ... you, so you know without me telling you that we have this right even more." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]]; [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
contextId.quote: If others exercised ... you, do we not have even more?
